\newcommand{\ottT}{
\ottrulehead{\textcolor{teal}{T}}{::=}{\ottcom{time}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{n}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{constant}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \infty }{}{}{}{\ottcom{end of time}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{t}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{abstract time}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottmv{n} \times \ottmv{t} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{scalar time}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \textcolor{teal}{  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  +  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  } }{}{}{}{\ottcom{sum}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{max} \, \ottsym{(}  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{max}}}

\newcommand{\ottlf}{
\ottrulehead{\textcolor{teal}{\pi}}{::=}{\ottcom{time range}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{[}  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{]}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{range}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\textcolor{teal}{\pi}_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \cup  \textcolor{teal}{\pi}_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{union}}}

\newcommand{\ottres}{
\ottrulehead{\rho}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \ottmv{M} _{  \textcolor{teal}{\pi}  } }{}{}{}{\ottcom{resource with lifetime}}}

\newcommand{\ottc}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{c}}{::=}{\ottcom{commands}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{def} \, \ottmv{M}  \langle  \ottmv{t}  \rangle  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \rho_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{:}  \rho_{\ottmv{k}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{c}  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{definition}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{time} \, \ottmv{t}  \ottsym{=}  \textcolor{teal}{T}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{time definition}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  \ottmv{M}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{instantiaion}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{invoke} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{invoke}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \textbf{when} \,\,  \textcolor{teal}{T}  \,\, \{  \ottnt{c}  \} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{timed execution}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{c}  \ottsym{@}  \ottmv{t}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{bind end time}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{sequence}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}\mbox{$\mid$}}  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{parallel}}}

\newcommand{\otttyp}{
\ottrulehead{\tau}{::=}{\ottcom{types}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\rho}{}{}{}{\ottcom{resource with lifetime}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\rho  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{t}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\backslash{}$}}  \textcolor{teal}{T}  \ottsym{]}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{substitute}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\forall \, \ottmv{t}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{(}  \rho_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \rho_{\ottmv{k}}  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{M}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{t_{\ottmv{l}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{component type}}}

\newcommand{\ottG}{
\ottrulehead{\Gamma}{::=}{\ottcom{type store}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \tau_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{:}  \tau_{\ottmv{i}}  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{concrete}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{M}  \ottsym{:}  \tau  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{component definition}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ { \Gamma }_{ [  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ,  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  ] } }{}{}{}{\ottcom{shrink}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \cup  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{union}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{*}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{separating split}}}

\newcommand{\ottsto}{
\ottrulehead{\Theta}{::=}{\ottcom{time store}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{t_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{:}  \textcolor{teal}{T_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{concrete}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \geq  \ottmv{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Theta}{}{}{}{\ottcom{constraint}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Theta  \geq  \textcolor{teal}{T}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{order all}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \cup  \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{union}}}

\ottrulehead{\ottnt{terminals}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline

\newcommand{\ottformula}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{formula}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{judgement}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{judgements}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{type store equality}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottmv{M}  \in  \Gamma }{}{}{}{\ottcom{defined in type store}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \tau}{}{}{}{\ottcom{type store access}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}  \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{time store equality}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \geq  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{time ordering}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \textbf{\textcolor{blue}{todo} } }{}{}{}{\ottcom{todo}}}

\newcommand{\ottJop}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{Jop}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }  \ottnt{c}  \dashv_{ \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }  \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{}{}{}{}}

% defns Jop
%% defn check
\newcommand{\ottdruleCheckDef}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Theta  ,  \Gamma  \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{:}  \rho_{\ottmv{i}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{:}  \rho_{\ottmv{j}}  \ottsym{\}}  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }  \ottnt{c}  \dashv_{  \textcolor{teal}{  \textcolor{teal}{T}  +  \ottmv{t_{\ottmv{l}}}  }  }  \Theta'  ,  \Gamma  \cup  \Gamma' }%
\ottpremise{\Gamma''  \ottsym{=}  \Gamma  \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{M}  \ottsym{:}  \forall \, \ottmv{t}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{(}  \rho_{\ottmv{i}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \rho_{\ottmv{j}}  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{M}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{t_{\ottmv{l}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{\}}}%
}{
 \Theta  ,  \Gamma  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }  \ottkw{def} \, \ottmv{M}  \langle  \ottmv{t}  \rangle  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{i}}}  \ottsym{:}  \rho_{\ottmv{i}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{:}  \rho_{\ottmv{j}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{c}  \ottsym{\}}  \dashv_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }  \Theta  ,  \Gamma'' }{%
{\ottdrulename{CheckDef}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCheckInst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{M}  \in  \Gamma }%
}{
 \Theta  ,  \Gamma  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  \ottmv{M}  \dashv_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }  \Theta  ,  \Gamma  \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}   \ottmv{M} _{  \ottsym{[}  \textcolor{teal}{T}  \ottsym{,}   \infty   \ottsym{]}  }   \ottsym{\}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{CheckInst}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCheckInvoke}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \forall \, \ottmv{t}  \ottsym{.}  \ottsym{(}  \rho_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \rho_{\ottmv{j}}  \ottsym{)}  \rightarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{M}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{t_{\ottmv{l}}}  \ottsym{)}}%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{=}  \Gamma'  \ottsym{*}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \rho_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{t}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\backslash{}$}}  \textcolor{teal}{T}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{:}  \rho_{\ottmv{j}}  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{t}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\backslash{}$}}  \textcolor{teal}{T}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{\}}}%
}{
 \Theta  ,  \Gamma  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }  \ottkw{invoke} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{j}}}  \ottsym{)}  \dashv_{  \textcolor{teal}{  \textcolor{teal}{T}  +  \ottmv{t_{\ottmv{l}}}  }  }  \Theta  ,  \Gamma' }{%
{\ottdrulename{CheckInvoke}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCheckSeq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Theta  ,  \Gamma  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \dashv_{ \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }  \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \dashv_{ \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }  \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
}{
 \Theta  ,  \Gamma  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \dashv_{ \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }  \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{CheckSeq}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCheckPar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{=}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{*}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
\ottpremise{ \Theta  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \dashv_{ \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }  \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  ,  \Gamma'_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Theta  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \dashv_{ \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }  \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  ,  \Gamma'_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
}{
 \Theta  ,  \Gamma  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}\mbox{$\mid$}}  \ottnt{c_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \dashv_{ \ottkw{max} \, \ottsym{(}  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)} }  \Theta  ,  \Gamma'_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \cup  \Gamma'_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{CheckPar}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCheckWhen}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{=}   { \Gamma }_{ [  \textcolor{teal}{T}  ,  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ] } }%
\ottpremise{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{=}   { \Gamma }_{ [  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ,  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  ] } }%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{=}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{*}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
\ottpremise{ \Theta  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }  \ottnt{c}  \dashv_{ \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }  \Theta  \cup  \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  ,  \Gamma'_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{3}}}  \ottsym{=}   { \Gamma'_{{\mathrm{2}}} }_{ [  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  ,   \infty   ] } }%
\ottpremise{\Theta'  \ottsym{=}  \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \geq  \textcolor{teal}{T}}%
}{
 \Theta  ,  \Gamma  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }   \textbf{when} \,\,  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \,\, \{  \ottnt{c}  \}   \dashv_{ \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }  \Theta  \cup  \Theta'  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \cup  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{3}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{CheckWhen}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleWeaken}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \geq  \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{ \Theta  ,  \Gamma  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }  \ottnt{c}  \dashv_{ \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }  \Theta'  ,  \Gamma' }%
}{
 \Theta  ,  \Gamma  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }  \ottnt{c}  \dashv_{ \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }  \Theta'  ,  \Gamma' }{%
{\ottdrulename{Weaken}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCheckTimeDef}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Theta  ,  \Gamma  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }  \ottkw{time} \, \ottmv{t}  \ottsym{=}  \textcolor{teal}{T'}  \dashv_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }  \Theta  \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{t}  \ottsym{:}  \textcolor{teal}{T'}  \ottsym{\}}  ,  \Gamma }{%
{\ottdrulename{CheckTimeDef}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCheckTimeBind}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Theta  ,  \Gamma  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }  \ottnt{c}  \dashv_{ \textcolor{teal}{T'} }  \Theta'  ,  \Gamma' }%
}{
 \Theta  ,  \Gamma  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T} }  \ottnt{c}  \ottsym{@}  \ottmv{t}  \dashv_{ \textcolor{teal}{T'} }  \Theta  \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottmv{t}  \ottsym{:}  \textcolor{teal}{T'}  \ottsym{\}}  ,  \Gamma' }{%
{\ottdrulename{CheckTimeBind}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefncheck}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Theta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash_{ \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }  \ottnt{c}  \dashv_{ \textcolor{teal}{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }  \Theta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCheckDef{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCheckInst{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCheckInvoke{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCheckSeq{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCheckPar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCheckWhen{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWeaken{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCheckTimeDef{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleCheckTimeBind{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJop}{
\ottdefncheck{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsJop
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}
